queries.description: Show all commands and usage (Tab shows suggestions when multiple matches).
Clear terminal output.
Search with filters (and/or/not, ~ fuzzy, date_from/date_to, has/missing, comma values). Supports limit and pipes.
examples: search in commands for command="nmap" limit=5
search in notes for n:"Recon" t:"nmap"
search in notes for not keyword="todo" date_from=2024-01-01
search in notes for keyword="tcp" | copy
search in commands for tags~"nmap" | export
search in commands for tags~"nmap" | export path="nmap.txt"
search in commands for tags~"nmap" | open 12
search in commands for tags~"nmap" | use target "Acme"

queries.description: Show command history (use Up/Down).
Show next page for the last search (alias: next).
Show next page for the last search.
Show a short preview from the last search scope.
Save the last search by name: save search MySearch.
Run a saved search by name: run search MySearch.
Clear command history (alias: history clear).
Clear terminal + history + selected target.
Open a page: open notes|commands|targets|settings.
Open notes page (same as open notes).
Open commands page (same as open commands).
Open targets page (same as open targets).
Open settings page (same as open settings).
Set live target by name: use target "Acme".
Add a new target: add target "Acme".
Select target context: select target "Acme" { IP="1.2.3.4" }. Alias: select from targets.
When target selected: add IP="1.2.3.4" DOMAIN="acme.com".
Add target element key/value: add element IP 5.
Exit target context (alias: exit).
Exit target context.
